text: Jean de Courbes (1592 – 1641), or Juan de Courbes, was a French engraver who was active in Spain. ==Gallery== File:Sir Philip Sidney by Jean de Courbes, after Unknown artist.jpg File:Courbes-atocha.jpg File:Courbes-felipe IV e Isabel-1622.jpg File:Mary Herbert, Countess of Pembroke by Jean de Courbes.jpg File:Retrato de Góngora by Jean de Courbes.jpg ==References== ==External links== Category:1592 births Category:1641 deaths Category:17th-century engravers Category:16th-century French people Category:17th-century French people Category:French engravers Category:French expatriates in Spain
title: Jean de Courbes
